channel.title: Leon Benoit
channel.description: Recent news about Leon Benoit, from openparliament.ca.

item.title: Mentioned by Vermilion Standard
item.description:
Waste transfer station opens near Mannville
From left: County of Minburn Administrative Executive Trudy Shukalak, Deputy Mayor Village of Mannville Margaret Hatch, MP Vegreville-Wainwright Leon Benoit, County of Minburn Councillor and Chairman of the Joint Landfill/Transfer Committee Richard ... “Our government's top priority is jobs, growth and long-term prosperity,” said Leon Benoit, the Member of Parliament for Vegreville-Wainwright, on behalf of the Honourable Denis Lebel, Minister of Infrastructure, Communities and Intergovernmental Affairs, and ...
